definitions.definition: strengthen or support, especially with additional personnel or material.
examples: paratroopers were sent to reinforce the troops already in the area
synonyms: top up "the need to reinforce NATO troops"

definitions.definition: strengthen (an existing feeling, idea, or habit).
examples: various actions of the leaders so reinforced fears and suspicions that war became unavoidable
synonyms: improve "reinforcing links between colleges and companies"
